import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; const ModalEdit = (props) => { const {show, handleClose, dataEditAccount, handleAccountEdit} = props const handleChange = (e) => { setData({ ...data, faculty_name: e.target.value }) } useEffect(() => { if (dataEditAccount) { setData(dataEditAccount) } }, [dataEditAccount]) return( Edit Accounts
) } export default ModalEdit
